Package game.actor

Class Allosaur

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.actor.Dinosaur
game.actor.Allosaur
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface, NeedsPlayer
public class Allosaur
extends Dinosaur
Class creation for the Allosaur, a carnivorous dinosaur.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) static int ADULT_AGE
    The age threshold that indicates the adult age for the dinosaur.

    The display character for an adult dinosaur.
    private java.util.ArrayList<Dinosaur> attacked_dinosaur
    Array list to keep track of the different dinosaurs attacked.

    Array list to keep track of the timer for each attacked dinosaur object.

    The display character for a baby dinosaur.
    (package private) static int BREEDING_LEVEL
    The minimum hit points required for a dinosaur to breed.

    The amount of hit points the dinosaur's corpse provides when it dies.

    The hit points threshold that indicates if the dinosaur is hungry.

    The maximum hit points for the dinosaur.

    The maximum thirst level for a dinosaur.

    The starting values for the thirst level.
    (package private) static int THIRSTY_LEVEL
    The thirst level threshold that indicates if a dinosaur is thirsty.
    (package private) static int UNCONSCIOUS_LIMIT
    The number of turns a dinosaur can remain unconscious before it dies.

  • Constructor Details

    • Allosaur

      public Allosaur​(int age)
      First overloaded constructor of the Allosaur class. All Allosaur have 100 hit points. The baby Allosaur will have 'a' as its display and the adult will have 'A'.
      Parameters:
      age - the current age of the allosaur to be created for

    • Allosaur

      public Allosaur​(int age, char gender)
      Second overloaded constructor of the Allosaur class.
      Parameters:
      age - the current age of the allosaur to be created for
      gender - the gender of the allosaur to be created for

  • Method Details

    • getAllowableActions

      public Actions getAllowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
      Lists all the actions that the other actor can perform on the current actor. In this case, it allows the Player to feed the dinosaur.
      Overrides:
      getAllowableActions in class Actor
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the Actor that might be performing attack
      direction - String representing the direction of the other Actor
      map - current GameMap
      Returns:
      actions

    • eatsFood

      public void eatsFood​(Food food)
      The eating action. If the food is an Egg, increase hit points by 10, and if it is a Corpse, increase by the corpse's available hit points. If the food is a meal kit, increase to max hit points.
      Specified by:
      eatsFood in class Dinosaur
      Parameters:
      food - the type of food

    • drinksWater

      public void drinksWater()
      The drinking water action executed. This increases the dinosaur's water levels by 30 points.
      Specified by:
      drinksWater in class Dinosaur

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      The method that will be run every turn in order for the dinosaur to decide which action to take.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the Action to be performed
      See Also:
      Actor.playTurn(Actions, Action, GameMap, Display)
